name: Tiny Quick E-mail
author: Marijan Å uflaj

sections.description:
Plugin that enables you to send e-mails quickly from your wordpress. You can create categories, sort your users and each admin on your blog can have its own address book with its own settings. If you have problem with this plugin, go to wp-admin/error.log and send it to me.

Features

  • Add contacts
  • Sort them by categories
  • Send e-mails from your dashboard
  • Save/Edit/Delete e-mails
  • Auto save open e-mail
  • Add users just by clicking on them
  • Full AJAX
  • Custom setting for each admin

Planned Features

  • Send e-mail to users that have commented on your blog
  • Choose who can use this plugin (for now just admins)
  • E-mail revisions
  • Import contacts from Gooogle, Yahoo and MSN
  • Export/Import e-mails, contacts and settings
  • Send files
  • Add picture to contacts

Source SVN

  • svn checkout http://svn.wp-plugins.org/tiny-quick-e-mail/trunk/ tiny-quick-e-mail

Support

  • Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/php4every1
  • Facebook: http://www.new.facebook.com/profile.php?id=1296304925&ref=mf
  • Plugin home: http://php4every1.com/scripts/tiny-quick-email-wordpress-plugin/
sections.installation:
1. Upload folder tiny-quick-e-mail to your /wp-content/plugins directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
